. There is not much tourism in this calm city. So prepare to see a mexican city where travellers are not expected that much.
There is an ADO bus station in the city. It is amongst other cities served from
San Andrés Tuxtla is located on the Highway 180, about 3 hours from
Walking around is no big deal downtown, but for larger distances it might be better with a taxi.
You can find taxis, which offer four pricing levels. Beginning with $13, it will become more the further away you want to go.
Also there are small busses ("camiones") which connect the parts of the city. Just ask for the destination or read the plates in the windshield.

value: content=Former this was only a cultural center. Now this is also used as a small museum, you can find pre-hispanic culture. But cultural events still happen to be here.
name=Museo Regional de San Andrés Tuxtla
content=In this museum, first opened in the beginning of 2008, you can find some exhibits out of the area. Some inhabitants donated pieces never seen before.

content=The lagoon is located a few minutes north of San Andrés. The nature is undestroyed here. In the rain time the water level actually gets lower, and in the dry season it raises. On the first Friday of March the cave nearby is used for a ritual: The region gets blessed.

name=Estacíon de Biologia Tropical Los Tuxtlas (Los Tuxtlas Tropical Biology
Station)
content=Do some exiting treks into the wilderness. Talk to one of the scientists if you can do so. Tourists are not very often here.

Small restaurants are all over the place and offer typical mexican food.

value: directions=Located in the street next to the parking lot of the Hotel del Parque
content=If you are looking for descent sea food, you can find some here.
content=Very cheap hotel which is a little dirty. For the traveller with no money it is sufficient.
content=This also offers some rooms to stay, not more.

Both of those hotels offer different prices depending if you want a room with clima or ventilator.

value: content=Small hotel which is a little bit cheaper.
content=Nice hotel located at the Zocalo. Offers clean rooms and friendly staff. Has a restaurant.
content=The obligatory well located, expensive hotel.

There are some internet cafes around.

value: address=Located in front of the street which is next to the pink church at the end of the street Madero
content=They offer ten computers for you work with.

There is an ADO bus station in the city. It connects to all major and minor cities around. You can get to the beautiful, more touristic town
